Date: Thu, 21 Jan 1999 13:33:10 +0100 From: Matthias Berth <berth@rz.uni-greifswald.de>
I have a lot of elimination problems, tried Singular on one of them -- 10 days computing time, 500 MB memory and no result so far.
The problems are of the form
p_1^n_1 A + p_2^n_2 = 0 p_3^n_3 B + p_4^n_4 = 0 etc.
where the p_i are polynomials in x_1...x_n and one wants to eliminate the x_i to get a relation between A, B etc. (I just thought you might be interested in challenging problems, solving problems of the above class would have some effect on solving ordinary differential equations).
